title: Largest possible sum of values from theList

content.question:
Consider the following code segment. Assume that index1 is a number between 1 and LENGTH(theList), inclusive, and index2 is a number between 2 and LENGTH(theList) - 1, inclusive.

theList <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> [9, -1, 5, 2, 4, 8]
x <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> theList[index1] + theList[index2]
What is the largest possible value that the variable x can have after the code segment executes?

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Determine the result of code segments.
